title: 区块崩溃，在region找不到对应区块号怎么办？
author: inuyasha01
txt_content:
Level name: DIM2

Chunk: (at 4,4,13 in -44,3; contains blocks -704,0,48 to -689,255,63)


Region: (-2,0; contains chunks -64,0 to -33,31, blocks -1024,0,0 to -513,255,511)


然而，DIM2世界的region文件夹里根本找不到 r.-44.3.mca   。。十分紧急！求大神解决QAQ

replies.author: inuyasha01
replies.txt_content: 实在不会解决。。。只能暂时把那几个区块封锁起来。。。急切求解决办法
